name: purple-stream-theme
description: A modern dark purple-themed theme for Visual Studio Code

scripts.config-git: git config --global user.email 'demonelicharles@gmail.com' && git config --global user.name 'zcnxs-official' && git remote set-url origin 'https://github.com/zcnxs-official/Purple-Stream-Visual-Studio-Code-Theme-.git' && git remote -v
scripts.build: vsce package --out ./dist/built/public-build(latest).vsix && git add . && git commit -m "build: update theme package" && git push --set-upstream origin main
scripts.publish: vsce publish && git push --set-upstream origin main
